mn143:2.3: pāde sirasā vandāhi → vandāhi evañca vadehi (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi → vandāhi evañca vadehi (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn143:4.2: muddhani → muddhānaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | abhimattheyya → abhimantheyya (bj) | ūhananti → ohananti (sya-all, km)
mn143:4.4: sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā → adhimattā vātā sīsaṁ parikantanti (bj, sya-all, km)
